column1: #Text=Polycrystalline samples of GeTe have been obtained via arc-melting of a stoichiometric mixture of the pure elements, Ge (Alfa Aesar, 99.999%), Sn (Alfa Aesar 99.8%) and Te (Alfa Aesar, 99.99%) in an Edmund Buhler MAM-1 mini-arc-furnace.
#Text=The reagents were ground for 10 min in an agate mortar and cold-pressed before the melting process, which was performed under inert Ar atmosphere in a water-cooled Cu crucible.
